bring_brand.CN:
Whoot! 為你帶來全新功能、更好的體驗：
- 新的用戶教學，更易上手
- 根據味道、環境及服務，尋找心儀餐廳及多方面為餐廳評分
一如既往，我們亦改善了 Whoot! 的介面及體驗，用落更流暢！
bring_brand.EN:
We're bringing you brand new features for an even better Whoot!:
- New user tutorial, designed to help you understand how Whoot! works better
- Criteria for rating restaurants:  View & rate restaurants based on taste, atmosphere and service
And as usual, we've optimized Whoot! for an even smoother experience and improved UI/UX, enjoy!

invite_via.EN: ❶.Your referred friend should sign up for Whoot! Via a third-party authorized login platform or registering on the app, where they’ll be asked to input your invite code. Upon successful login, both you and your friends can claim your Whoot! Tokens.

- 推薦好友即可獲得
- 輸入推薦碼 / 優惠碼兌換獲得（不定期舉辦）
- 每成功使用2個銀幣即可獲得1個金幣
invite_friends.EN:
- Invite your friends
- Input a referral code/event code
- Successfully redeem with 2 Silver Tokens to receive 1 Gold

uploadShopPhotoTips.CN: (最少三張最多五張, 需包含門店圖, 用餐區及廚房。限jpg, png, bmp 格式且檔案大小不超過5MB.)
uploadShopPhotoTips.EN: (min.3 pic in .jpg, .png, or .bmp, including front view, dining space and kitchen. Max.5MB)
